6SZA.MU.summary: Sanlorenzo S.p.A designs, builds, and sells boats and pleasure boats in Europe, APAC, the Americas, the Middle East, and Africa. The company operates through Yacht Division, and Superyacht Division. It also sells its own and other branded pre-owned yachts. The company was formerly known as Cantieri Navali San Lorenzo SpA and changed its name to Sanlorenzo S.p.A in 2005. Sanlorenzo S.p.A is headquartered in Ameglia, Italy.

ASR.MI.summary: A.S. Roma S.p.A. operates a football club in Italy. The company operates a stadium; sells match tickets, and television and radio rights; sells AS Roma branded products through AS Roma stores; and licenses AS Roma branded products. It also engages in the multi-year rights management of players; and sponsorship and advertising business. The company was founded in 1927 and is based in Rome, Italy.

ASRAF.summary: A.S. Roma S.p.A. operates a football club in Italy. The company operates a stadium; sells match tickets, and television and radio rights; sells AS Roma branded products through AS Roma stores; and licenses AS Roma branded products. It also engages in the multi-year rights management of players; and sponsorship and advertising business. The company was founded in 1927 and is based in Rome, Italy.

JUVE.F.summary: Juventus Football Club S.p.A. operates as a professional football club in Italy. The company participates in national and international football competitions, as well as organizes matches. It is also involved in licensing television and media rights; sponsorship activities; direct retail, e-commerce, and trademark licensing for the creation of products, as well as the marketing of additional services to fans; management of players' registration rights; sale of advertising space; and operation of a stadium and museum. Juventus Football Club S.p.A. was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Turin, Italy. Juventus Football Club S.p.A. is a subsidiary of EXOR N.V.

LZO1.F.summary: S.S. Lazio S.p.A. operates a sports club in Italy. The company was founded in 1900 and is based in Formello, Italy.

TGYM.MI.summary: Technogym S.p.A., a wellness company, designs, manufactures, and sells fitness equipment worldwide. The company offers a range of wellness, physical exercise, and rehabilitation solutions. Its products include treadmills, exercise bikes, elliptical cross trainers, rowers, stair climbers, upper body trainers, selectorized equipment, plate loaded equipment, multigyms and cable stations, benches and racks, free weights, functional training equipment, stretching equipment, and tools and accessories. The company markets its products to fitness and wellness clubs; hospitality and residential; health, corporate, and performance; and home and consumer segments through field and inside sales, retail, and wholesale channels. Technogym S.p.A. was founded in 1983 and is based in Cesena, Italy. Technogym S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Wellness Holding S.r.l.
